The Buddha Speaks the SÅ«tra of the Jewel Topknot DhÄraá¹‡Ä« for Eliminating All Calamities and Obstacles
Tripiá¹­aka Master from the Western Regions, Chao-san-ta-fu Shih-kuang-lu-qing
Mingjiao Great Master, Subject Faxian Translated by Imperial Order At that time the World-Honored One said to Ä€nanda:
There is a dhÄraá¹‡Ä« called the Jewel Topknot.
It can bring great benefits to sentient beings.
It can destroy sentient beings' extremely grave evil karma.
Ä€nanda, in the past when Indra fought with the asuras,
Indra retreated in defeat, fleeing in fear with no end in sight.
He then quickly came to where the Buddha was
and sadly said to me:
World-Honored One, with great compassion, please take pity on me.
I am afraid of the asuras and cannot remain at ease.
I only pray that the Great Compassionate One will grant me peace and security.
Ä€nanda, when I heard Indra say this,
I immediately told him, You should not be afraid. I will give you protection.
Heavenly Lord, in a past eon,
there was a buddha world called 'Contemplation'.
There is a Buddha named AvalokiteÅ›vara TathÄgata.
That Buddha bestowed upon me the Ratnagarbha DhÄraá¹‡Ä«.
This dhÄraá¹‡Ä« was spoken with the same mouth by one koá¹­i Buddhas.
It has great power and can bring auspiciousness.
If there are people who write it out, wear it on their heads, recite it, and uphold it,
I know that these people will eliminate all their sins and increase immeasurable blessings.
They will always protect themselves and be able to benefit others.
Lord of the Devas, you should always remember to write it out and wear it on your head.
It will cause all that you do to be in accordance with your wishes.
This DhÄraá¹‡Ä« King is also called the Wish-Fulfilling.
It can bestow the supreme good benefits upon sentient beings.
Those asuras will naturally cease their thoughts.
Even if they come to fight, they will be defeated and subdued.
I will then speak the Ratnagarbha DhÄraá¹‡Ä« for them, saying:

Not only can it subdue the asura kings,
But it can also subdue all the devas, nÄgas, yaká¹£as, gandharvas, garuá¸as, kiá¹ƒnaras,
And the bhÅ«tas, vetÄlas, and others.
Those who harass sentient beings,
By the power of this dhÄraá¹‡Ä«, they will be protected and unable to cause harm.
It can also eliminate famine, epidemic diseases, poisonous medicines, and untimely death.
In dreams, it removes inauspiciousness and frightens evil demons.
Moreover, if someone seeks wealth and treasures,
Or seeks offspring,
And recites this dhÄraá¹‡Ä«,
They will all obtain their wishes, have immeasurable wealth, and their retinue will flourish.
Ä€nanda, the merits and virtues of this dhÄraá¹‡Ä« are exceptional.
If I were to explain them in detail, they would be inexhaustible.
At that time, when Ä€nanda heard the Buddha speak this dhÄraá¹‡Ä«,
He respectfully received and upheld it, paid homage to the Buddha, and withdrew.
